org.apache.cactus.server
Interface WebImplicitObjects

All Superinterfaces:
ImplicitObjects
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractWebImplicitObjects
public interface WebImplicitObjects
extends ImplicitObjects

Interface for implicit objects that exist for all web requests (HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse and ServletContext).

Version:
$Id: //depot/dev/bt-open-source/3rdparty/cactus141j2ee13/doc/api/framework-13/org/apache/cactus/server/WebImplicitObjects.html#1 $
